summary: Growth focuses on personal and professional development through strategic planning and self-awareness. Relevant resources aid in building confidence, resilience, and effective networking. One notable course, Align the Misaligned, emphasizes discovering personal strengths and weaknesses, conducting SWOT analysis, and formulating strategic asks for better networking and resource acquisition.
excerpt: Aligning the Misaligned involves a journey of growth and strategic planning. Discover personal strengths, embrace weaknesses, conduct SWOT analysis, and formulate strategic asks.
